document_data.name: Halagothra
document_data.mainbody: '''Halagothra''' was a healer and revered citizen of [[Tarmalune]], who lived in the Great Port as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: In her youth, Halagothra was considered an "spitfire of a girl." As of 1479 DR, Halagothra was described as a wrinkled, crotchety old woman.
